timeline.name: Frontend/Backend
timeline.description: I strive to stay up to date with the latest technologies and best practices, balancing frontend and backend development to create robust and aesthetically pleasing applications. My goal is to exceed user expectations by providing innovative and intuitive solutions.

timeline.name: Motivation and Discipline
timeline.description: Rigorous and highly motivated, I am determined to deliver quality solutions and collaborate effectively within dynamic teams.

timeline.name: Exploration and Curiosity
timeline.description: I am also passionate about various science fileds, astronomy, and manga. I love exploring new horizons, whether in the real world or imaginary universes. I am always seeking new experiences and knowledge, and I believe curiosity is the key to success.

timeline.name: Seeking Exciting Projects
timeline.description: I am currently looking for professional opportunities as a Fullstack JavaScript developer. If you have job offers, freelance missions, or interesting projects to suggest/offer, do not hesitate to contact me. I would be delighted to discuss your needs and see how I can help you achieve your goals.

technologies.title: Technologies Used
technologies.description: Here are some of the technologies that I use, or have already used, to develop modern, high-performance web applications.

informations.subtitle: I am a Fullstack Javascript Developer
informations.title: This site is an interactive portfolio, designed to introduce myself and my projects. It offers smooth and intuitive navigation, with some animations and an elegant design. It is designed to be accessible on all devices, providing an optimal user experience.

about.title: About
about.primary: I am a Fullstack JavaScript developer recently graduated with a professional degree in web and mobile web development (Bac +2). Specialized in React.js, I am passionate about continuous learning and solving technical challenges.
about.secondary: I strive to stay up to date with the latest technologies and best practices, balancing frontend and backend development to create robust and aesthetically pleasing applications. My goal is to exceed user expectations by providing innovative and intuitive solutions.
about.tertiary: Rigorous and highly motivated, I am determined to deliver quality solutions and collaborate effectively within dynamic teams.
about.quaternary: I am also passionate about various sciences, astronomy, and manga. I love exploring new horizons, whether in the real world or imaginary universes. I am always seeking new experiences and knowledge, and I believe curiosity is the key to success.
about.quinary: I am currently looking for professional opportunities as a Fullstack JavaScript developer. If you have job offers, freelance missions, or interesting projects to propose, do not hesitate to contact me. I would be delighted to discuss your needs and see how I can help you achieve your goals.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some projects I completed during my training at O'Clock school. These projects allowed me to develop my web development skills, mainly using technologies such as JavaScript, React, Redux, TypeScript, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, Git, and GitHub.
projects.description2: This achievement is the result of my end-of-studies project at O'Clock school, a challenge I took up in total autonomy. Over a month, I was able to consolidate all the skills developed during my training by creating a web application from scratch, in collaboration with a team of four developers. This project, in perpetual evolution, is particularly close to my heart. As the lead frontend developer, I continue to enrich the application by regularly integrating new features and optimizations.
projects.description3: Only the Atlas of Forgotten Realms is currently deployed online. To access it, click the view project button.

formationProjects.title: Atlas of Forgotten Realms
formationProjects.description: The Atlas of Forgotten Realms is a web application for Dungeons and Dragons fans. With it, immerse yourself in a universe where you can not only create, customize, and manage your characters but also design and orchestrate your own campaigns.
formationProjects.imageDescription: Character creation in the Atlas of Forgotten Realms.
formationProjects.image2Description: All races in the Atlas of Forgotten Realms.
formationProjects.image3Description: Barbarian class in the Atlas of Forgotten Realms.
formationProjects.image4Description: Extract from the source code of a character component for statistics.
formationProjects.image5Description: Extract the source code of a character component for certain attributes
formationProjects.image6Description: Image of a Tiefling in the Atlas of Forgotten Realms.
formationProjects.alt: Atlas of Forgotten Realms - Barbarian class
formationProjects.alt2: Atlas of Forgotten Realms - Character creation
formationProjects.alt3: Atlas of Forgotten Realms - Discover the races
formationProjects.alt4: Atlas of Forgotten Realms - Source code excerpt
formationProjects.alt5: Atlas of Forgotten Realms - Source code excerpt

formationProjects.title: Ghibliothèque
formationProjects.description: This site, now entirely front-end, uses React, Redux, Tailwind, and several libraries to provide full access to the Studio Ghibli film catalog. Each film is accompanied by images, detailed summaries, and various information. Currently, the site is deployed online.
formationProjects.imageDescription: Home page of the Ghibli Library
formationProjects.image3Description: Overview of the films available in the Ghibli Library.
formationProjects.image4Description: Film detail with all its information.
formationProjects.image5Description: Excerpt from the source code of the component to display the films.
formationProjects.image6Description: Image from the film My Neighbor Totoro.

formationProjects.title: Pokedex
formationProjects.description: This interactive backend-only site, without dependency on the official Pokémon API, allows users to create a personalized Pokedex by adding their own Pokémon. Currently, the site is not deployed online.
formationProjects.imageDescription: General view of the Pokémon list.
formationProjects.image2Description: Pokedex homepage showing recently added Pokémon.
formationProjects.image3Description: Detail of a Pokémon with all its information.
formationProjects.image4Description: List of favorite Pokémon in the Pokedex.
formationProjects.image5Description: Excerpt from the database source code.

formationProjects.title: O'Recipes
formationProjects.description: This site is a fast and interactive cooking recipes platform designed with React. This project integrates user authentication and an add to favorite feature. Currently, the site is not deployed online.
formationProjects.imageDescription: Page of a chocolate mousse recipe.
formationProjects.image2Description: List of favorite recipes on O'Recipes.
formationProjects.image4Description: Excerpt from user reducer source code.
formationProjects.image5Description: Excerpt from the source code of the login form.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Here's where you can get in touch with me. Send me a message to discuss your projects, my skills, or any other topic that interests you. I will be happy to respond. You can also contact me via LinkedIn or GitHub.
